level.text: A taximeter shall be inspected by the taximeter business whenever it is installed, repaired, or calibrated. Inspection shall include examination of the taximeter installation and operation to verify compliance with:
The taximeter specifications, type approvals, tolerances, and all other requirements of the commission, including, but not limited to a measured mile run test;
The rate of fare established by the Commission;
The standards set forth in the sections of the taxicab owners’ rules regarding taximeters; and
All other applicable federal and District regulations and guidelines.
This section shall not apply to repairs which are made exclusively to the printing mechanism or the resetting of the date and/or time on the printer receipt.
